00040 function RemoveBackSlashes($str) {
00041 
00042     return preg_replace('/\\\\\\\\/', '\\', $str);
00043 }
00044 
00051 function AuthHTMLHeader($reloadrate= 0)
00052 {
00053     if (isset($_GET['logout'])) {
00054         LogUserOut();
00055     }
00056 
00057     HTMLHeader($reloadrate);
00058 }

00064 function AuthHTMLFooter()
00065 {
00066     global $ADMIN, $Reload, $SessionTimeout, $View;
00067 
00068     $_SESSION['Timeout']= time() + $SessionTimeout;
00069     ?>
00070     </table>
00071     <table>
00072         <tr id="footer">
00073             <td class="user">
00074                 <a href="<?php echo $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] ?>?logout"><?php echo _TITLE('Logout') ?></a>
00075 
00076                 (<label id="timeout"></label>)
00077                 <script language="javascript" type="text/javascript">
00078                     <!--
00079                     // Add one to session timeout start, to LogUserOut() after redirect below (it's PHP's task)
00080                     // Otherwise session timeout restarts from max
00081                     var timeout= <?php echo $_SESSION['Timeout'] - time() ?> + 1;
00082                     function countdown()
00083                     {
00084                         if (timeout > 0) {
00085                             timeout-= 1;
00086                             min= Math.floor(timeout / 60);
00087                             sec= timeout % 60;
00088                             // Pad left
00089                             if (sec.toString().length < 2) {
00090                                 sec= "0" + sec;
00091                             }
00092                             document.getElementById("timeout").innerHTML= min + ":" + sec;
00093                         }
00094                         else {
00095                             // redirect
00096                             window.location= "/index.php";
00097                             return;
00098                         }
00099                         setTimeout("countdown()", 1000);
00100                     }
00101                     countdown();
00102                     // -->
00103                 </script>
00104 
00105                 <?php echo $_SESSION['USER'].'@'.$_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR'] ?>
00106             </td>
00107             <?php
00108             if (in_array($_SESSION['USER'], $ADMIN)) {
00109                 $file= $_SERVER['DOCUMENT_ROOT'].$_SERVER['PHP_SELF'];
00110                 if ($View->Controller($output, 'GetFileCvsTag', $file)) {
00111                     $cvstag= $output[0];
00112                 }
00113                 else {
00114                     $cvstag= _TITLE2('CVS Tag');
00115                 }
00116                 ?>
00117                 <td class="cvs">
00118                     <?php echo $cvstag ?>
00119                 </td>
00120                 <?php
00121             }
00122             ?>
00123             <td>
00124                 <?php echo _TITLE2('Copyright') ?> (c) 2004-2009 Soner Tari. <?php echo _TITLE2('All rights reserved.') ?>
00125             </td>
00126         </tr>
00127     <?php
00128     HTMLFooter();
00129 }

00137 function CheckPageActivation($active)
00138 {
00139     global $VIEW_PATH;
00140 
00141     if (!$active) {
00142         ?>
00143         <td class="infobox">
00144             <?php
00145             echo _TITLE2('Resource not available').': '.basename($_SERVER['PHP_SELF']);
00146 
00147             require_once($VIEW_PATH.'footer.php');
00148             cwwui_syslog(LOG_ERR, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, 'Page not active.');
00149             exit(1);
00150     }
00151 }

00165 function PrintHelpBox($msg= '', $width= 300)
00166 {
00167     global $ShowHelpBox;
00168 
00169     if ($ShowHelpBox) {
00170         if ($msg !== '') {
00171             ?>
00172             <table id="helpbox" style="width: <?php echo $width ?>px;">
00173                 <tr>
00174                     <td class="leftbar">
00175                     </td>
00176                     <td>
00177                         <?php
00178                         echo preg_replace("/\n/", '<br />', _($msg));
00179                         ?>
00180                     </td>
00181                 </tr>
00182             </table>
00183             <?php
00184             return;
00185         }
00186         else {
00187             cwwui_syslog(LOG_DEBUG, __FILE__, __FUNCTION__, __LINE__, '$msg empty');
00188         }
00189     }
00190 }
00191 
00203 function PrintHelpWindow($msg, $width= 'auto', $type= 'INFO')
00204 {
00205     global $IMG_PATH, $HelpBoxTypes, $InHelpRegion, $ErrorMsg, $WarnMsg, $InfoMsg, $ShowHelpBox;
00206 
00207     $boxes= array(
00208         'ERROR' => 'ErrorMsg',
00209         'WARN' => 'WarnMsg',
00210         'INFO' => 'InfoMsg',
00211         );
00212 
00213     if (array_key_exists($type, $boxes)) {
00214         ${$boxes[$type]}.= ${$boxes[$type]} ? '<br />'.$msg : $msg;
00215     }
00216 
00217     if (isset($InHelpRegion) && $InHelpRegion) {
00218         foreach ($boxes as $type => $msgname) {
00219             if (($type !== 'INFO') || $ShowHelpBox) {
00220                 if (isset(${$msgname}) && (${$msgname} !== '')) {
00221                     ${$msgname}= preg_replace("/\n/", '<br />', ${$msgname});
00222                     ?>
00223                     <table id="mainhelpbox" style="width: <?php echo $width ?>">
00224                         <tr>
00225                             <th colspan="2">
00226                                 <?php echo _($HelpBoxTypes[$type]['name']) ?>
00227                             </th>
00228                         </tr>
00229                         <tr>
00230                             <td class="image">
00231                                 <img src="<?php echo $IMG_PATH.$HelpBoxTypes[$type]['icon'] ?>" name="ComixWall" alt="ComixWall" border="0">
00232                             </td>
00233                             <td>
00234                                 <?php echo ${$msgname} ?>
00235                             </td>
00236                         </tr>
00237                     </table>
00238                     <?php
00239                     // Messsage is printed now, reinitialize it
00240                     ${$msgname}= '';
00241                 }
00242             }
00243         }
00244     }
00245 }
00246 
00249 function PrintLogsHelp($msg)
00250 {
00251     if (isset($msg)) {
00252         $msg.= "\n\n"._HELPWINDOW('Log keeping capacity of ComixWall is limited only by the size of the disks on your system.
00253 
00254 If you are not seeing as many number of lines as you were expecting, this may be because the log file has turned over and put in a compressed archive file. The default maximum number of archive files for most services is 100, and can be configured on the system configuration pages. Depending on how busy a service it is, this many log archives may mean months of logging in most cases. You can download the log files using the Download button.
00255 
00256 You can search the logs by entering keywords or extended regular expressions in Regexp box. Regular expressions are de-facto standard for text searching.');
00257     }
00258 
00259     PrintHelpWindow($msg);
00260 }
00261

00265 {

00267         $msg.= "\n\n"._HELPWINDOW('If you are not seeing as many number of lines as you were expecting, this may be because the log file has turned over and put in a compressed archive file.
00268 
00269 You can search the logs by entering keywords or extended regular expressions in Regexp box. Regular expressions are de-facto standard for text searching.');
00270     }
00271 
00272     PrintHelpWindow($msg);
00273 }

00277 function ProcessStartLine(&$startline)
00278 {
00279     global $View;
00280 
00281     if ($_POST['StartLine']) {
00282         if (preg_match('/^\d+$/', $_POST['StartLine'])) {
00283             $_SESSION[$View->Model]['StartLine']= $_POST['StartLine'] - 1;
00284         }
00285         else {
00286             PrintHelpWindow(_NOTICE('FAILED').': '._NOTICE('Page start line').': '.$_POST['StartLine'], 'auto', 'ERROR');
00287         }
00288     }
00289 
00290     if ($_SESSION[$View->Model]['StartLine']) {
00291         $startline= $_SESSION[$View->Model]['StartLine'];
00292     }
00293     else {
00294         $startline= 0;
00295         $_SESSION[$View->Model]['StartLine']= $startline;
00296     }
00297 }
00298 
00301 function ProcessNavigationButtons($linesperpage, $total, &$startline, &$headstart)
00302 {
00303     global $View;
00304 
00305     if ($_POST) {
00306         if ($_POST['First']) {
00307             $startline= 0;
00308         }
00309         else if ($_POST['Previous']) {
00310             $startline-= $linesperpage;
00311         }
00312         else if ($_POST['Next']) {
00313             $startline+= $linesperpage;
00314         }
00315         else if ($_POST['Last']) {
00316             $startline= $total;
00317         }
00318     }
00319 
00320     $headstart= $startline + $linesperpage;
00321     if ($headstart > $total) {
00322         $headstart= $total;
00323         $startline= $headstart - $linesperpage;
00324     }
00325     if ($startline < 0) {
00326         $startline= 0;
00327         $headstart= $linesperpage;
00328     }
00329     $_SESSION[$View->Model]['StartLine']= $startline;
00330 }

00410 function SetRefreshInterval()
00411 {
00412     global $View;
00413 
00414     if ($_POST['RefreshInterval']) {
00415         if (preg_match('/^\d+$/', $_POST['RefreshInterval'])) {
00416             $_SESSION[$View->Model]['ReloadRate']= $_POST['RefreshInterval'] >= 3 ? $_POST['RefreshInterval']:3;
00417         }
00418         else {
00419             PrintHelpWindow(_NOTICE('FAILED').': '._TITLE('Refresh interval').': '.$_POST['RefreshInterval'], 'auto', 'ERROR');
00420         }
00421     }
00422 }
00423 
00429 function UpdateLogsPageSessionVars(&$count, &$re)
00430 {
00431     global $View;
00432 
00433     if ($_POST['LinesPerPage']) {
00434         if (preg_match('/^\d+$/', $_POST['LinesPerPage'])) {
00435             $_SESSION[$View->Model]['LinesPerPage']= $_POST['LinesPerPage'];
00436         }
00437         else {
00438             PrintHelpWindow(_NOTICE('FAILED').': '._TITLE('Lines per page').': '.$_POST['LinesPerPage'], 'auto', 'ERROR');
00439         }
00440     }
00441 
00442     if ($_SESSION[$View->Model]['LinesPerPage']) {
00443         $count= $_SESSION[$View->Model]['LinesPerPage'];
00444     }
00445     else {
00446         $count= 25;
00447         $_SESSION[$View->Model]['LinesPerPage']= $count;
00448     }
00449 
00450     // Empty regexp posted is used to clear the session regexp, use isset() here
00451     if (isset($_POST['SearchRegExp'])) {
00452         $_SESSION[$View->Model]['SearchRegExp']= $_POST['SearchRegExp'];
00453     }
00454 
00455     if ($_SESSION[$View->Model]['SearchRegExp']) {
00456         $re= RemoveBackSlashes($_SESSION[$View->Model]['SearchRegExp']);
00457         $_SESSION[$View->Model]['SearchRegExp']= $re;
00458     }
00459     else {
00460         $re= '';
00461     }
00462 }

00480         _TITLE('DateTime'),

00482         _TITLE('Size'),
00483         _TITLE('Level'),
00484     );
00485     ?>
00486     <tr id="logline">
00487         <th><?php echo _('Line') ?></th>
00488         <?php
00489         foreach ($Modules[$view]['Fields'] as $header) {
00490             ?>
00491             <th><?php echo _($header) ?></th>
00492             <?php
00493         }
00494         ?>
00495     </tr>
00496     <?php
00497 }

00508 function PrintLogCols($linenum, $cols, $module= '')
00509 {
00510     global $Modules, $View;
00511 
00513     if ($module == '') {
00514         $module= $View->Model;
00515     }
00516 
00517     $View->FormatLogCols($cols);
00518 
00519     // Center the line number column
00520     ?>
00521     <td class="center">
00522         <?php echo $linenum ?>
00523     </td>
00524     <?php
00525     foreach ($Modules[$module]['Fields'] as $field) {
00526         ?>
00527         <td>
00528             <?php echo $cols[$field] ?>
00529         </td>
00530         <?php
00531     }
00532 }

00540 function PrintNVPsVGraph($data, $color= 'red', $title= '')
00541 {
00542     if (!isset($data)) {
00543         $data= array();
00544     }
00545 
00546     $max= 0;
00547     if (count($data) > 0) {
00548         $max= max($data);
00549     }
00550     ?>
00551     <strong><?php echo $title ?></strong> <?php echo _TITLE2('total').'= '.array_sum($data) ?>
00552     <table id="statsgraph">
00553         <?php
00554         foreach ($data as $name => $value) {
00555             $width= 0;
00556             if ($value > 0) {
00557                 $width= intval(100 * $value / $max);
00558             }
00559             ?>
00560             <tr>
00561                 <td class="hlegend">
00562                     <table>
00563                         <tr id="hbar">
00564                             <td class="legend">
00565                                 <?php echo $name ?>
00566                             </td>
00567                         </tr>
00568                     </table>
00569                 </td>
00570                 <td>
00571                     <table>
00572                         <tr id="hbar">
00573                             <td style="width: <?php echo $width ?>%; background: <?php echo $color ?>;">
00574                             </td>
00575                             <?php
00576                             if ($value > 0) {
00577                                 ?>
00578                                 <td class="value"><?php echo $value ?></td>
00579                                 <?php
00580                             }
00581                             else {
00582                                 ?>
00583                                 <td class="valuezero"> </td>
00584                                 <?php
00585                             }
00586                             ?>
00587                         </tr>
00588                     </table>
00589                 </td>
00590             </tr>
00591             <?php
00592         }
00593         ?>
00594     </table>
00595     <?php
00596 }

00606 function PrintVGraph($data, $color= 'red', $title= '')
00607 {
00608     if (!isset($data)) {
00609         $data= array();
00610     }
00611 
00612     $max= 0;
00613     if (count($data) > 0) {
00614         $max= max($data);
00615     }
00616     ?>
00617     <strong><?php echo $title ?></strong> <?php echo _TITLE2('total').'= '.array_sum($data) ?>
00618     <table id="statsgraph">
00619         <tr>
00620             <td>
00621                 <?php
00622                 for ($i= 0; $i < count($data); $i++) {
00623                     $i= sprintf('%02d', $i);
00624                     $width= 0;
00625                     if (!isset($data[$i])) {
00626                         $data[$i]= 0;
00627                     }
00628                     if ($data[$i] > 0) {
00629                         $width= intval(100 * $data[$i] / $max);
00630                     }
00631                     ?>
00632                     <table>
00633                         <tr id="hbar">
00634                             <td class="legend">
00635                                 <?php printf('%02d', $i) ?>
00636                             </td>
00637                             <td style="width: <?php echo $width ?>%; background-color: <?php echo $color ?>;">
00638                             </td>
00639                             <?php
00640                             if ($data[$i] > 0) {
00641                                 ?>
00642                                 <td class="value"><?php echo $data[$i] ?></td>
00643                                 <?php
00644                             }
00645                             else {
00646                                 ?>
00647                                 <td class="valuezero"> </td>
00648                                 <?php
00649                             }
00650                             ?>
00651                         </tr>
00652                     </table>
00653                     <?php
00654                 }
00655                 ?>
00656             </td>
00657         </tr>
00658     </table>
00659     <?php
00660 }

00668 function PrintHGraph($data, $color= 'red', $title= '')
00669 {
00670     if (!isset($data)) {
00671         $data= array();
00672     }
00673 
00674     $max= 0;
00675     if (count($data) > 0) {
00676         $max= max($data);
00677     }
00678     ?>
00679     <strong><?php echo $title ?></strong> <?php echo _TITLE2('total').'= '.array_sum($data) ?>
00680     <table id="statsgraph">
00681         <tr class="hgraph">
00682             <?php
00683             for ($i= 0; $i < count($data); $i++) {
00684                 $i= sprintf('%02d', $i);
00685                 ?>
00686                 <td>
00687                     <table>
00688                         <tr>
00689                             <td class="bartop">
00690                                 <?php
00691                                 $height= 0;
00692                                 if (!isset($data[$i])) {
00693                                     $data[$i]= 0;
00694                                 }
00695                                 if ($data[$i] > 0) {
00696                                     echo $data[$i];
00697                                     $height= intval(100 * $data[$i] / $max);
00698                                 }
00699                                 ?>
00700                             </td>
00701                         </tr>
00702                         <tr id="bar">
00703                             <td id="bar" height="<?php echo $height ?>px" style="background-color: <?php echo $color ?>;">
00704                             </td>
00705                         </tr>
00706                         <tr>
00707                             <td class="legend">
00708                                 <?php printf('%02d', $i) ?>
00709                             </td>
00710                         </tr>
00711                     </table>
00712                 </td>
00713                 <?php
00714             }
00715             ?>
00716         </tr>
00717     </table>
00718     <?php
00719 }

00727 function PrintNVPs($nvps, $title, $maxcount= 100)
00728 {
00729     ?>
00730     <strong><?php echo $title ?></strong>
00731     <table id="stats">
00732         <?php
00733         if (isset($nvps)) {
00734             arsort($nvps);
00735 
00736             $count= 0;
00737             foreach ($nvps as $name => $value) {
00738                 ?>
00739                 <tr>
00740                     <td class="value">
00741                         <?php echo $value ?>
00742                     </td>
00743                     <td class="name">
00744                         <?php
00745                         // Empty strings print default gettext header lines otherwise
00746                         echo $name !== '' ? _(htmlspecialchars($name)):'';
00747                         ?>
00748                     </td>
00749                 </tr>
00750                 <?php
00751                 if (++$count >= $maxcount) {
00752                     break;
00753                 }
00754             }
00755         }
00756         ?>
00757     </table>
00758     <?php
00759 }

00770 function PrintGraphNVPSet($stats, $date, $parent, $conf, $type, $style)
00771 {
00772     global $NvpColCount;
00773 
00774     $printfunc= ($type == 'Horizontal') ? 'PrintHGraph' : 'PrintVGraph';
00775     if ($style == 'Hourly') {
00776         FillGraphDataRange($data, $stats, $date, 24, $parent);
00777     }
00778     else {
00779         FillDatesGraphData($data, $stats, $date, 'Sum', $parent);
00780         $printfunc= 'PrintNVPsVGraph';
00781     }
00782 
00783     if (isset($conf['Divisor'])) {
00784         DivideArrayData($data, $conf['Divisor']);
00785     }
00786     ?>
00787     <table id="statset">
00788         <tr>
00789             <td>
00790                 <?php
00791                 $printfunc($data, $conf['Color'], _($conf['Title']));
00792                 ?>
00793                 <table>
00794                     <?php
00795                     $count= 0;
00796                     foreach ($conf['NVPs'] as $name => $title) {
00797                         if (($count % $NvpColCount) == 0) {
00798                             ?>
00799                             <tr>
00800                             <?php
00801                         }
00802                         ?>
00803                         <td class="nvps">
00804                             <?php
00805                             $nvps= array();
00806                             FillNVPs($nvps, $stats, $date, $parent, $name, $style);
00807                             if (isset($conf['Divisor'])) {
00808                                 DivideArrayData($nvps, $conf['Divisor']);
00809                             }
00810                             PrintNVPs($nvps, _($title), 10);
00811                             ?>
00812                         </td>
00813                         <?php
00814                         if (($count++ % $NvpColCount) == ($NvpColCount - 1)) {
00815                             ?>
00816                             </tr>
00817                             <?php
00818                         }
00819                     }
00820                     ?>
00821                 </table>
00822             </td>
00823         </tr>
00824     </table>
00825     <?php
00826 }

00835 function PrintMinutesGraphNVPSet($stats, $parent, $conf, $type)
00836 {
00837     $PrintGraphFunc= ($type == 'Horizontal') ? 'PrintHGraph' : 'PrintVGraph';
00838     FillGraphData($data, $stats['Mins'], 60, $parent);
00839

00842     }

00855                             if (isset($stats[$parent]) && isset($stats[$parent][$name])) {
00856                                 ?>

00863                                     }
00864                                     PrintNVPs($nvps, _($title), 10);
00865                                     ?>
00866                                 </td>
00867                                 <?php
00868                             }
00869                         }
00870                         ?>
00871                     </tr>
00872                 </table>
00873             </td>
00874         </tr>
00875     </table>
00876     <?php

00881 function GetLogFile()
00882 {
00883     global $View;
00884 
00885     $logfile= '';
00886 
00887     if ($_POST['LogFile']) {
00888         $logfile= $_POST['LogFile'];
00889     }
00890     else if ($_SESSION[$View->Model]['LogFile']) {
00891         $logfile= $_SESSION[$View->Model]['LogFile'];
00892     }
00893 
00894     if ($View->Controller($output, 'SelectLogFile', $logfile)) {
00895         $logfile= $output[0];
00896     }
00897     else {
00898         $View->Controller($output, 'SelectLogFile', '');
00899         $logfile= $output[0];
00900     }
00901 
00902     $_SESSION[$View->Model]['LogFile']= $logfile;
00903 
00904     return $logfile;
00905 }

00911 function PrintLogFileChooser($logfile)
00912 {
00913     global $View;
00914 
00915     $selectedlogs= '';
00916     ?>
00917     <table>
00918         <tr>
00919             <td>
00920                 <form action="<?php echo $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] ?>" method="post">
00921                     <?php echo _TITLE('Archives').': ' ?>
00922                     <select name="LogFile">
00923                         <?php
00924                         $View->Controller($output, 'GetLogFilesList');
00925                         $filelist= unserialize($output[0]);
00926                         foreach ($filelist as $filepath => $startdate) {
00927                             $file= basename($filepath);
00928 
00929                             $option= sprintf('%-19s - %s', $startdate, $file);
00930                             if (preg_match('/.*\.gz$/', $file)) {
00931                                 // $logfile does not have .gz extension, because it points to the file decompressed by cwc
00932                                 // Update this local copy for comparison and to print it below
00933                                 $logfile.= basename($logfile).'.gz' == $file ? '.gz' : '';
00934                             }
00935 
00936                             if (basename($logfile) == $file) {
00937                                 $selected= 'selected';
00938                                 $selectedlogs= $option;
00939                             }
00940                             else {
00941                                 $selected= '';
00942                             }
00943                             ?>
00944                             <option <?php echo $selected ?> value="<?php echo $filepath ?>"><?php echo $option ?></option>
00945                             <?php
00946                         }
00947                         ?>
00948                     </select>
00949                     <input type="submit" name="Apply" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Apply') ?>"/>
00950                     <input type="submit" name="Download" value="<?php echo _CONTROL('Download') ?>"/>
00951                 </form>
00952             </td>
00953             <td>
00954                 <strong><?php echo _TITLE('Selected').': '.$selectedlogs ?></strong>
00955             </td>
00956         </tr>
00957     </table>
00958     <?php
00959 }

00966 function GetHwInfo($names, &$hw)
00967 {
00968     global $View;
00969 
00970     $hw= array();
00971     if ($View->Controller($output, 'GetSysCtl', 'hw')) {
00972         // Create text from array first
00973         $lines= implode("\n", $output);
00974         foreach ($names as $name) {
00975             if (preg_match("/^hw\.$name=(.*)$/m", $lines, $match)) {
00976                 $hw[$name]= $match[1];
00977             }
00978             else {
00979                 $hw[$name]= _('Unknown');
00980             }
00981         }
00982     }
00983 }
00984 
00992 function DivideArrayData(&$data, $divisor)
00993 {
00994     if (isset($data) && ($divisor != 0)) {
00995         foreach ($data as $name => $value) {
00996             $data[$name]= ceil($value / $divisor);
00997         }
00998     }
00999 }
01000 
01014 function FillDatesGraphData(&$data, $stats, $datearray, $name, $parent= '')
01015 {
01016     global $View;
01017 
01018     if ($datearray['Month'] == '') {
01019         for ($m= 1; $m <= 12; $m++) {
01020             $m= sprintf('%02d', $m);
01021             for ($d= 1; $d <= 31; $d++) {
01022                 $d= sprintf('%02d', $d);
01023                 $datearray['Month']= $m;
01024                 $datearray['Day']= $d;
01025                 $date= $View->FormatDate($datearray);
01026                 SetGraphData($data, $stats, $date, $name, $parent);
01027             }
01028         }
01029     }
01030     else if ($datearray['Day'] == '') {
01031         for ($d= 1; $d <= 31; $d++) {
01032             $d= sprintf('%02d', $d);
01033             $datearray['Day']= $d;
01034             $date= $View->FormatDate($datearray);
01035             SetGraphData($data, $stats, $date, $name, $parent);
01036         }
01037     }
01038     else {
01039         $date= $View->FormatDate($datearray);
01040         SetGraphData($data, $stats, $date, $name, $parent);
01041     }
01042 }
01043 
01044 function SetGraphData(&$data, $stats, $date, $name, $parent)
01045 {
01046     if ($parent == '') {
01047         if (isset($stats[$date][$name])) {
01048             $data[$date]= $stats[$date][$name];
01049         }
01050     }
01051     else {
01052         if (isset($stats[$date][$parent][$name])) {
01053             $data[$date]= $stats[$date][$parent][$name];
01054         }
01055     }
01056 }
01057 
01071 function FillGraphDataRange(&$data, $stats, $datearray, $range, $parent)
01072 {
01073     global $View;
01074 
01075     if ($datearray['Month'] == '') {
01076         for ($m= 1; $m <= 12; $m++) {
01077             $m= sprintf('%02d', $m);
01078             for ($d= 1; $d <= 31; $d++) {
01079                 $d= sprintf('%02d', $d);
01080                 $datearray['Month']= $m;
01081                 $datearray['Day']= $d;
01082                 $date= $View->FormatDate($datearray);
01083                 FillGraphData($data, $stats[$date]['Hours'], $range, $parent, 'Sum');
01084             }
01085         }
01086     }
01087     else if ($datearray['Day'] == '') {
01088         for ($d= 1; $d <= 31; $d++) {
01089             $d= sprintf('%02d', $d);
01090             $datearray['Day']= $d;
01091             $date= $View->FormatDate($datearray);
01092             FillGraphData($data, $stats[$date]['Hours'], $range, $parent, 'Sum');
01093         }
01094     }
01095     else {
01096         $date= $View->FormatDate($datearray);
01097         FillGraphData($data, $stats[$date]['Hours'], $range, $parent, 'Sum');
01098     }
01099 }
01100 
01115 function FillGraphData(&$data, $stats, $range, $parent, $name= '')
01116 {
01117     if (isset($stats)) {
01118         for ($hm= 0; $hm < $range; $hm++) {
01119             $hm= sprintf('%02d', $hm);
01120 
01123             // Such initialization is faster than any if condition
01124             $data[$hm]+= 0;
01125 
01126             if ($name != '') {
01127                 if (isset($stats[$hm][$parent][$name])) {
01128                     $data[$hm]+= $stats[$hm][$parent][$name];
01129                 }
01130             }
01131             else {
01132                 if (isset($stats[$hm][$parent])) {
01133                     $data[$hm]+= $stats[$hm][$parent];
01134                 }
01135             }
01136         }
01137     }
01138 }
01139 
01149 function FillNVPs(&$data, $stats, $datearray, $parent, $name, $style)
01150 {
01151     global $View;
01152 
01153     if ($datearray['Month'] == '') {
01154         for ($m= 1; $m <= 12; $m++) {
01155             $m= sprintf('%02d', $m);
01156             for ($d= 1; $d <= 31; $d++) {
01157                 $datearray['Month']= $m;
01158                 $datearray['Day']= sprintf('%02d', $d);
01159                 $date= $View->FormatDate($datearray);
01160                 MergeStats($data, $stats[$date], $parent, $name, $style);
01161             }
01162         }
01163     }
01164     else if ($datearray['Day'] == '') {
01165         for ($d= 1; $d <= 31; $d++) {
01166             $datearray['Day']= sprintf('%02d', $d);
01167             $date= $View->FormatDate($datearray);
01168             MergeStats($data, $stats[$date], $parent, $name, $style);
01169         }
01170     }
01171     else {
01172         $date= $View->FormatDate($datearray);
01173         MergeStats($data, $stats[$date], $parent, $name, $style);
01174     }
01175 }
01176 
01190 function MergeStats(&$data, $stats, $parent, $name, $style)
01191 {
01192     if ($style == _('Hourly')) {
01193         for ($h= 0; $h < 60; $h++) {
01194             $h= sprintf('%02d', $h);
01195             SumData($data, $stats['Hours'][$h][$parent][$name]);
01196         }
01197     }
01198     else {
01199         SumData($data, $stats[$parent][$name]);
01200     }
01201 }
01202 
01205 function SumData(&$data, $stats)
01206 {
01207     if (isset($stats)) {
01208         foreach ($stats as $name => $value) {
01209             $data[$name]+= $value;
01210         }
01211     }
01212 }
